娙字的基本解释

娙
xíng
〔娙娥〕中国汉代宫中女官名。
女子修长美好：“赵燕锡媌娙。”

娙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xíng］
［《廣韻》户經切，平青，匣。］
［《廣韻》五莖切，平耕，疑。］
(1)女子身材长而美。
(2)见“娙娥”、“娙何”。

娙字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　娙； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页262第17
【廣韻】五莖切【集韻】魚莖切，?音俓。【說文】長好貌。一曰女身長謂之娙。　又【集韻】丘耕切，音牼。又五?切，䀴平聲。義?同。　又【廣韻】戸經切【集韻】【韻會】乎經切【正韻】奚經切，?音形。漢女官名。武帝幸郉夫人，號娙娥。

娙字的源字形

字源演变：

娙字的起名意思

女子修长美好。还指中国汉代宫中女官名，娙娥。

Puff
Basic explanation of words
Puff
xíng
[娙'e] The name of the female official in the palace of the Han Dynasty in China.
The woman is slender and beautiful: "Zhao Yanxi 媌娙."
Puff
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xíng］
["Guangyun" Household Jingqie, Pingqing, Xie. ]
["Guangyun" five stems cut, flat plowing, suspicious. ]
(1) Women are long and beautiful.
(2) See "娙'e", "娙何".
Puff
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　娙; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 262 17
【Guangyun】Five stems cut 【Jiyun】Fish stems are cut, sound. [Speaking] Good-looking. One said that the length of the female body is called the sorrow.　[Jiyun] Qiu Gengqie, sound. Five more cuts, flat sound. Righteous? Same.　[Guangyun] 戸经切 [Jiyun] [Yunhui] almost Jingqi [Zhengyun] Xijingqi,? Sound shape. Chinese female official name. Mrs. Wu Di Xing Xing, named Nao'e.

Puff
Name meaning
Women are slender and beautiful. It also refers to the name of the female official in the palace of the Han Dynasty in China, Nao'e.
xíng
прил. стройный; грациозный; прелестный (о женщине)
